Name: xho-imaamismaaeelng
Author: Imaam Ismaaeel Ngqoyiyana
Source: The Islamic Dawah Movement of Southern Africe(IDM) , https://www.alqurantranslation.com/

Translations.Text: Abo bangamakholwa bahlala (ekhaya), ngaphandle kwabo baziimbedlenge, (nabalimeleyo), abalingani nabo bazabalaza nzima balwe eNdleleni ka-Allâh ngobutyebi babo nangobomi babo. UAllâh Ubahlele ngokwamahlelo abo bazabalaza nzima balwe ngobutyebi babo nangobomi babo, bangentla kwabo bahlala (ekhaya). Kuye ngamnye kubo uAllâh Uthembisa (ngePaladesi), kodwa uAllâh Uthanda abo balwayo ngaphezu kwabo bahlala [ekhaya (yaye) Uza kubanika] umvuzo omkhulu
Amabakala (aphakamileyo) avela kuYe, noxolelo nenceba. Kwaye uAllâh nguMxoleli Ohlala Enenceba

Inene! Abo iingelosi zibathathayo (ekufeni) lo gama bezenze gwenxa iziqu zabo (njengoko baye bahlala nabantu abangakholwayo nangona ukufuduka kwakunyanzelekile kubo, iingelosi ziya kuthi (kubo): “Nanikwimeko enjani nina (ehlabathini)?” Baphendule: “Sasibuthathaka, sicinezelekile emhlabeni”. Zize (iingelosi) zithi: “Ingaba umhlaba ka-Allâh wawungebanzanga ngokwaneleyo na ukuba nifuduke apho nanikhona?” Abo bantu banjalo baya kufumana ikhaya labo esiHogweni, esinjani ukungcola sona isiphelo sohambo
Ngaphandle kwabo bangenamandla nabacinezelekileyo, amadoda, abafazi nabantwana abangenandlela yimbi abanokwenza ngayo, bengenalo necala abanokuya kulo
Kubo aba, kukho ithemba lokuba uAllâh Uya kubaxolela kuba uAllâh Uyazihlambulula izono, Axolele Aphinde Axolele

Lowo ufudukayo (emke kowabo) ngenxa ka-Allâh uya kufumana emhlabeni iindawo zokuhlala ezininzi nokuphila okuninzi ngoAllâh. Kananjalo lowo ushiya iwabo aze abe ngumngcucalazi ka-Allâh noMthunywa waKhe, aze asutywe kukufa, inene umvuzo walowo uyimfuneko enkulu ukuba awufumane kuAllâh kwaye uAllâh nguMxoleli, uSozinceba

Kananjalo nina xa niseluhambeni elizweni, akuyi kuba sisono kuni ukuba niyayifinyeza iSalâh ukuba ngaba noyikisela ukuba abangakholwayo banganifaka enkathazweni, inene abangakholwayo baya kuhlala beziintshaba zenu eziselubala
